title: Haven't received icon yet
body: The Mark of Fortune icon from the Lunar Revel event I still have not received yet.  It said I should get it within 2 weeks after the event ended. The 2 weeks have passed.

replies.body: If you haven't received your icon yet, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to look into individual cases to see what happened.  We'll reply back as soon as possible.
